mapper.select: SELECT T1.CUST_CARE_CNT_ID , T1.CUST_ID , T1.NAME , T1.CUST_INITIAL , T1.TEL_M , T1.TEL_O , T1.TEL_R , T1.EXT , T1.EMAIL , T1.STUS_CODE_ID , T1.CRT_USER_ID , T1.CRT_DT , T1.UPD_USER_ID , T1.UPD_DT , T1.TELF FROM SAL0026D T1 WHERE T1.CUST_CARE_CNT_ID = #{custCareCntId} AND ROWNUM <= 1
